description: Developed fully featured complex WordPress plugins and themes for large enterprise clients. Contributed to WordPress Core and next-gen product.

Designed and developed the entire Back-end of a live project using the Django Framework, amounting to about 50 APIs. Also contributed to the Android Application development along with a team of other developers..

Developed the entire official website of my college's Formula Student Team from ideation to launch. Made a custom newsletter-email submission and storage system integrated with Firebase to to save 80% in hosting costs.
